traits.Amphibious: The crab can breathe air and water.
traits.Banded Claw: On one of its claws, the crab wears a rune-covered copper band that makes it immune to being charmed, frightened, and paralyzed. The copper band is worthless as a treasure, as the magic is keyed to this crab.

actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled, escape DC 14+1d6 + 11. The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
